news: [Contribution] jSQL works fine when column type is string but can fail when types do not match in UNION statement. To illustrate: WebGoat on HSQLDB requires a Normal strategy with 2 integers to work. Contact me on GitHub if you are interested to work on this.
[Thanks to @komomon, @gamblingmaster2020, @galihap76, @Xem44XMe] You can also add a Star to GitHub at https://github.com/ron190/jsql-injection
[Contribution] Clone the wiki and open a pull request to improve documentation at https://github.com/ron190/jsql-injection/wiki
